items.sentence: Night was already giving way to the first glimmers of day when Tom finally emerged from the forest.
When I tried to move the desk, one of its legs made a jarring sound as it scraped across the floor.
I'm not stupid enough to climb a mountain in the winter without first making adequate preparations.
I realize that this may sound crazy, but I think that I've fallen in love with your younger sister.
Even though I'm trying to lose weight, I just can't resist eating chocolate if I'm offered a piece.
